hero.title: Welcome to House of Ravya (HOR)
hero.subtitle: Rooted in India. Raised for the world.
hero.description: Discover a world where tradition meets tenderness.

items.title: Artisan Craftsmanship
items.description: Handmade by Indian artisans using heritage crafts like Ajrakh, block printing, Jamdani, and IKAT. Each product carries centuries‚Äëold stories of tradition, care, and cultural pride, designed for babies and pets alike.

items.title: Sustainability
items.description: We choose natural fibers, eco‚Äëfriendly dyes, and low‚Äëimpact, small‚Äëbatch processes. Fair wages, dignified livelihoods, and full supply‚Äëchain traceability ensure ethics at every step.

items.title: Global Appeal
items.description: Design‚Äëled craftsmanship, export‚Äëready quality, and low MOQs with 30‚Äì45‚Äëday turnaround. Made in India and celebrated worldwide.

hero.title: Tradition. Innovation. Impact.
hero.description: House of Ravya was born out of a simple yet powerful idea ‚Äî to celebrate Indian artisanal traditions while building a responsible, modern supply chain.

story.title: Our Story
story.content:
House of Ravya was born from a desire to bring India‚Äôs timeless textile heritage into the lives of families around the world. What began as a deep appreciation for handcrafted fabrics has grown into a conscious design house creating soulful babywear and pet accessories, woven with care and cultural depth.

At HOR, we collaborate with master artisans across India‚Äîreviving age‚Äëold crafts like Ajrakh, hand block printing, and khadi weaving. Each piece is created slowly and mindfully, using natural materials and traditional processes that honor the earth and those who work with it.

Our journey is rooted in simplicity, authenticity, and emotion. We believe that what touches the skin of a baby or a beloved pet should be as honest and pure as the love they bring into our lives.

From the first thread to the final touch, every product carries a story of human hands, heritage, and heart. This is not just fashion‚Äîit is a homecoming to values we hold dear: warmth, comfort, and conscious living.

items.title: Regenerative Materials
items.description: Low‚Äëimpact fibers like khadi, kala cotton, banana fiber, and pineapple fiber.

items.title: Women‚ÄëLed Production
items.description: Rural and tribal units led by women, providing fair wages and skill development.

items.title: Transparency
items.description: Small‚Äëbatch manufacturing with clean dyes and biodegradable packaging.
